channel.title: How do i make a item unspawnable for freeplayers and donators (562)
channel.description: Ok so i need to know how to get to the files so i can make a item unspawnable for free users and donators and how to make them unspawnable ? pelase help? and be specific

item.title: How do i make a item unspawnable for freeplayers and donators (562)
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:12, topic:387741”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=483536.msg3542585#msg3542585 date=1300972899]

if (itemid = #) { deleteitem(); sendMessage("This item is not spawnable)"; }

Probably the easiest method of doing this, although if you want it to be totally un spawn-able then you may need to add some methods into your main class.
[/quote]

Not being rude, but you claim to have written a framework and you don’t know the difference between = and ==?[/quote]
Could have been a typo.
^ Beaten too it, lul.

Also, I’d create an array of unspawnable items, then check the item against each element of the array, if the item id is in the array, don’t add the item.

Read full topic

Probably the easiest method of doing this, although if you want it to be totally un spawn-able then you may need to add some methods into your main class.[/quote]

item.source: How do i make a item unspawnable for freeplayers and donators (562)

item.title: How do i make a item unspawnable for freeplayers and donators (562)
item.dc:creator: @hydravision hydravision
item.description:
@hydravision wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:10, topic:387741”]if (itemid = 995) { deleteitem(); sendMessage("This item is only for admins!)"; }[/quote]
if (itemid= 995) { <= this is the item you want to be not spawnable
deleteitem(); <= this will delete the item from player inventory ( it won’t even show-up )
sendMessage(“This item is only for admins!)”; <= this is the message what will server send to player

Probably the easiest method of doing this, although if you want it to be totally un spawn-able then you may need to add some methods into your main class.

Thanks for Saphire`

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a item unspawnable for freeplayers and donators (562)
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

Look for “item” in your client.java, or wherever your commands are stored. There you should see it say something like playerRights = #. Change that number to 2. Then save, and compile.

Read full topic
